short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered email summarization using Google Gemini

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Email AI Assistant is your intelligent companion for Gmail, designed to make email management faster and more efficient. This free extension brings powerful AI capabilities right into your Gmail interface.

Key Features: 

✨ Smart Email Summarization • Get instant, concise summaries of long emails • Save time by quickly understanding email content • Perfect for catching up on lengthy email threads

✍️ AI Response Generation • Generate context-aware email responses • Choose from different tones and styles • Save time while maintaining professionalism

How It Works:

Install the extension and open Gmail
Look for the Email AI Assistant sidebar
Select any email and click "Summarize Email" or "Generate Response"
Get instant AI-powered assistance
Privacy & Security: • Works directly within Gmail • No email data stored • Secure and privacy-focused

Perfect for: • Busy professionals • Email-heavy roles • Anyone looking to improve email efficiency • Non-native English speakers • Teams handling high email volumes

This extension is completely free to use! If you find it helpful, consider supporting the project's development through a small donation.

Note: This extension requires access to your Gmail interface to provide its functionality. We take your privacy seriously and do not store any email content.
